channel.title: *508* help needed *508*
channel.description:
Ok so i need help doing a few thing and i thought that i would just put into one post.
1.) I need to know how to make NPC's aggressive, because i want the gods (bandos, armadyle, and zamorok) to auto attack you along with the minions.
2.) I have this kind of bug/glitch to where when people die on my server they won't lose their stuff and i was wondering if there was a way to change that.
3.) As you prolly already know i'm using Berky-Scape as my base and i need to fix all the glitches that came with it. Like i can't trade with anyone and i need to know how to make the person stop gaining xp after the inv is full.
If you can help with any of these problems please reply or PM me i really need help.

item.title: *508* help needed *508*
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

Ok so i need help doing a few thing and i thought that i would just put into one post.

1.) I need to know how to make NPC’s aggressive, because i want the gods (bandos, armadyle, and zamorok) to auto attack you along with the minions.

2.) I have this kind of bug/glitch to where when people die on my server they won’t lose their stuff and i was wondering if there was a way to change that.

3.) As you prolly already know i’m using Berky-Scape as my base and i need to fix all the glitches that came with it. Like i can’t trade with anyone and i need to know how to make the person stop gaining xp after the inv is full.

If you can help with any of these problems please reply or PM me i really need help.
